title: Himi 321
lyrics:
M.K.
1.
’I he ha’u ki Saione, ‘a hotau Misaia;
Ke ne fakamo’ui, ‘a e kakai hia,
Na’e ‘ikai masiva, ‘i he fakamālō,
He na’e fai hosana, ‘e he ngaahi fānau:
Tau hiva hosana, hosana, hosana,
Hosana, ki hotau ‘Eiki.
2.
Pea ‘oku kei ‘ofa, ki he fānau iiki,
‘A e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū, ‘i he maama lelei,
Tau fa’a fakataha, ke tau ā’i ia,
‘O fai ‘etau hosana, ki hotau Misaia,
Tau hiva hosana, hosana, hosana,
Hosana, ki hotau ‘Eiki.
3.
He kapau te tau vaivai, ‘i hono fakahā;
‘A e ongoongo lelei, ‘a hotau Misaia.
‘E hiki honau le’o, ‘e he ngaahi maka.
‘O fai honau hosana, ko hotau fakamā.
Tau hiva hosana, hosana hosana,
Hosana ki hotau ‘Eiki.*
